TopicTitle: Anybody know what this yellow/black checkerboard sphere is?

Articles.Content:
Saw this from orbit while preparing for an FTL mission to Jool

Any ideas?

It's a known bug. Sorry I can't actually remember the exact cause of it but I've definitely seen it before on here and seen it explained. I know that's not of much help but I can't find the thread anywhere in my history
Its an explosion caused by a kraken attack. BEWARE!!!
Ehh... Kerbin's center of mass has shifted in a rather extreme manner?

It appears you are using Interstellar. There's an option to scan for [i forgot the material name here] for you to mine it, and the spheres will appear, indicating the area where you can mine the specific material. Just discovered these yesterday by accident.

probably Lavos
And now I want to build the Epoch and the Black Omen in KSP.
It's from interstellar mod. I you are using the scanner, those blips will show.
Agh thanks, I just updated the Interstellar Mod and have never encountered that before.

A wild CENTER OF MASS appears!

CENTER OF MASS used CONFUSION! It's super effective!

But yeah, its just some... I believe yellow is Uranium.
Obviously it's the Center of Mass for Kerbin. On the surface. Because Kerbin's made of Neutronium on one side and negative matter on the other.
